What are the treatments for Kaposi Sarcoma ?,"Key Points
                    - There are different types of treatment for patients with Kaposi sarcoma.    - Treatment of epidemic Kaposi sarcoma combines treatment for Kaposi sarcoma with treatment for AIDS.    - Four types of standard treatment are used to treat Kaposi sarcoma:
